title: Rick And Morty
description: This project is about the Rick And Morty series that tries to search for the location of planets and how many residents there are on that planet

title: Web Chat
description: This project is about a chat in real time where you must register and log in, then enter the name of the room you want to enter with your friends

title: Pokedex
description: This project is about a Pokedex that has all the pokemon out there and can be filtered by type and name of the pokemon

title: Todo List
description: This project is about a task manager that consists of adding tasks, deleting them and knowing if it is already completed or not

title: Weather App
description: This project is about giving information to the user about the current weather in their location

title: Trivia Game
description: This project is about a question and answer app
